name: Aftershock
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Anarchist
oracle_text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

name: Anoint
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Armored Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahli *en*-Dal, bounty hunter

name: Armor Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."
flavor_text:
Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other."
Mirri: "After they're done trying to kill us, all right?"

name: Bandage
oracle_text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

name: Barbed Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor_text: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the Weatherlight.

name: Bottle Gnomes
oracle_text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Canyon Wildcat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

name: Carnophage
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
flavor_text: Eating is all it knows.

name: Charging Paladin
oracle_text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

name: Clot Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor_text:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
—Volrath

name: Coiled Tinviper
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

name: Conviction
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.

name: Craven Giant
oracle_text: Craven Giant can't block.
flavor_text:
What is high as a mountain and low as a snake?
—Dal riddle

name: Cursed Flesh
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . .

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

name: Dauthi Horror
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.

name: Dauthi Jackal
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"All dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed."
—Lyna, soltari emissary

name: Death's Duet
oracle_text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.

name: Death Stroke
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.

name: Diabolic Edict
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Greven *il*-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

name: Dungeon Shade
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

name: Elven Rite
oracle_text: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.
flavor_text: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

name: Elvish Fury
oracle_text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Endangered Armodon
oracle_text: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.
flavor_text: These are its last days. It is doomed to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

name: Flowstone Blade
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Furnace Brood
oracle_text: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.

name: Gaseous Form
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Hammerhead Shark
oracle_text: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

name: Harrow
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

name: Heartwood Dryad
oracle_text: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.
flavor_text: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

name: Horned Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have trample.
flavor_text: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text:
"So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Kindle
oracle_text: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
flavor_text: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

name: Lab Rats
oracle_text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.

name: Lightning Blast
oracle_text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Lowland Giant
flavor_text: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

name: Master Decoy
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Merfolk Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

name: Metallic Sliver
flavor_text: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

name: Mnemonic Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."
flavor_text:
"A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Mogg Conscripts
oracle_text: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
flavor_text:
"Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!"
—Tahngarth, aboard the Predator

name: Mogg Fanatic
oracle_text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "I got it! I got it! I—"

name: Mogg Flunkies
oracle_text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

name: Mounted Archers
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.

name: Mulch
oracle_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

name: Muscle Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor_text: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

name: Nomads en-Kor
oracle_text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor_text: The kor forsake roots for the winding of the path, forsake voices for the silence of the mind, forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Patchwork Gnomes
oracle_text: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
flavor_text:
"Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Provoke
oracle_text:
Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

name: Rats of Rath
oracle_text: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.
flavor_text:
"These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Reality Anchor
oracle_text:
Target creature loses shadow until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"See how you like it."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Rootwalla
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

name: Sandstone Warrior
oracle_text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I used to describe something stable as 'rock solid.' So much for that expression."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Scrivener
oracle_text: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"History is a potent weapon."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

name: Seething Anger
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: A hiss before dying.

name: Shackles
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Shackles of gold are still shackles.

name: Shadow Rift
oracle_text:
Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Draw a card.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Such fuss over machines, Gerrard. Remember that you are the prize of the Legacy. Throw away your toys!"
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Sift
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Skyshaper
oracle_text: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Skyshroud Elf
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
{1}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text:
"It is our duty to endure."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Skyshroud Troll
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Skyshroud Troll.
flavor_text: The elves and merfolk have nothing but bitterness for each other. The trolls, however, find them both rather tasty.

name: Smite
oracle_text: Destroy target blocked creature.
flavor_text:
"You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die."
—Gerrard, to Volrath

name: Soltari Lancer
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Soltari Lancer has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text:
"In times of war the victors rarely save their best for last."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Soltari Trooper
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Dauthi blood is soltari wine."
—Soltari Tales of Life

name: Spell Blast
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
flavor_text: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

name: Spike Colony
oracle_text:
Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Spinal Graft
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, 'Alas for the living.'"
—Dal myth of the wurm

name: Spirit en-Kor
oracle_text:
Flying
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor_text:
Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth.
—Kor requiem

name: Standing Troops
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

name: Staunch Defenders
oracle_text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

name: Stun
oracle_text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I concede it was a cheap shot, but it was the only one I could afford."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Telethopter
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Telethopter gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: After losing several of the devices to midair collisions, Greven forbade moggs from operating telethopters.

name: Thalakos Scout
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

name: Thalakos Seer
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You see our world when you shut your eyes so tightly that tiny shapes float before them."
—Lyna, to Ertai

name: Thrull Surgeon
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Just take a little off the top."

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Gone today, here tomorrow."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Trained Armodon
flavor_text: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

name: Twitch
oracle_text:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Battles are won in nuance.

name: Vampire Hounds
oracle_text: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

name: Verdigris
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Only the most sophisticated inventions can survive nature's unsophisticated motivations."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Wall of Diffusion
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Wall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.
flavor_text:
"The injury was being caught between this world and our own; the insult was to find walls within."
—Lyna, soltari emissary

name: Wayward Soul
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"No home, no heart, no hope."
—Stronghold graffito

name: Whispers of the Muse
oracle_text:
Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I followed her song only to find it was a dirge."
—Crovax

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You must do the same."

name: Winged Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have flying.
flavor_text:
"Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Youthful Knight
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text:
"Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."
—Oracle *en*-Vec
